short_description: Features / Specifications Penetrates, loosens and frees stuck, frozen or rusted parts Protects metal against moisture and corrosive elements Removes grease, grime, water deposits and much more Lubricates moving parts
summary: With literally thousands of uses, WD-40® is the #1 multi-purpose problem solver. It cleans, protects, penetrates, lubricates and displaces moisture like no other product on earth. In sizes and applications for every need.

short_description: Features / Specifications WD-40® can with built-in straw Smart new design allows for one-handed operation. 360° Valve - Flip it up for precision stream and down for regular spray action.
summary: Protect, clean and lubricate thousands upon thousands of items - without ever losing the straw again! The WD-40® Smart Straw Aerosol features a permanently attached straw that sprays two ways. Flip it up for a precision stream and down for regular spray action. This design allows for one-handed application and puts an exciting twist on this true American original.

This multi-use product is best dispensed from the Heavy Duty Empty Plastic Spray Applicator.The one-pint heavy-duty sprayer is meant for use with WD-40 bulk liquid. The adjustable spray nozzle converts the liquid to steam or spray for all sorts of uses. The durable plastic is specially treated on the inside to add stability for use.It's the perfect applicator for heavy users of WD-40. One pint heavy-duty sprayer for use with WD-40 bulk liquid. Adjustable spray nozzle for stream or spray. Durable plastic. Specially treated on inside to add stability for use with penetrating quality of the formula.

A fast-acting penetrant that gets deep into crevices, threads and seams to break the bonds that hold stuck parts together.. WD-40® Specialist® Rust Release Penetrant Spray is a fast-acting penetrant that quickly goes to work on rusted nuts, bolts, threads, locks and chains, and also leaves behind a protective layer to help prevent rust and corrosion from re-forming. Containing Blu Torch® Technology, a proprietary blend of synthetic additives, it is safe to use on plastics, rubber and metal. Extra-penetrating Blu Torch technology Ideal for use on nuts, bolts, threads and locks 50-state VOC compliant

meta_title: WD40 300059 SPECIALIST DIRT AND DUST RESISTANT DRY LUBE PTFE SPRAY 10O
summary: A dry lubricant that provides long-lasting lubrication and protection without attracting dirt and dust.  WD-40® Specialist® Dirt and Dust Resistant Dry Lube PTFE spray is ideal for reducing friction, providing long-lasting lubrication and corrosion protection with no oily residue. It dries quickly and resists dirt, dust and oil. Great for reducing friction and wear on blades and bits, door and window tracks, slides, conveyor belts, rollers, hinges, power tools and equipment. Effective in temperatures ranging from -100° F to 500° F. Safe on metals, plastic and rubber.  Won't attract dirt, dust or oil 50-state VOC compliant
meta_keyword: WD40 300059 SPECIALIST DIRT AND DUST RESISTANT DRY LUBE PTFE SPRAY 10O

summary: A foaming degreaser with deep penetrating action and a powerful stream that sprays up to 5 feet.  WD-40® Specialist ® Machine & Engine Degreaser Foaming Spray makes equipment run smoother, last longer and look like new. This aerosol has deep foaming penetrating action and a powerful stream that sprays up to 5 feet to quickly remove grease, oil, dirt and grime without engine disassembly. Great for auto and truck engines, tractors, forklifts, gears and chains, industrial machinery, farm and power equipment, and other metal tools. Safe for use on most metal when used as directed.  Water-based formula products deep foaming penetrating action 50-state VOC compliant

A thick gel lubricant that provides long-lasting lubrication that won't run or drip.  WD-40® Specialist® Spray & Stay Gel Lubricant No-Drip Formula offers 12 times longer-lasting lubrication compared to WD-40 Multi-Use Product. This unique spray gel lubricant stays where you spray, making it ideal for use on vertical surfaces and moving parts. This thick formula also prevents rust for up to one year.* Great for gears, bearings, cables, chains, rollers and more without making a mess. Effective in-use temperatures ranging from -100° F to 500° F. Safe on multiple surfaces including metals, plastic and rubber.  *Independent tests conducted in salt spray and humidity chamber. Results may vary depending on extreme conditions.  Thick formula prevents rust for up to one year Ideal for vertical suraces
